text: Vincenzo Bruno (born 2 July 1933) is an Italian coxswain. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's coxed pair where they came fifth. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Turin Category:Coxswains (rowing) Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Vincenzo Bruno
